author: Kuro
install_msg:
Thanks for installing `Osu` cog! CLICK THE CIRCLES, TO THE BEAT!
------------------------
To set API Key, run `[p]osuset creds`. To set emojis (SSH, SS, SH, S, A) for the osu! user info (except card), run `[p]osuset emoji`
description: Displays detailed user information about osu! users in an embed.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
